com.valentine.esp.bluetooth

Class VRScanCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.valentine.esp.bluetooth.VRScanCallback

  • public abstract class VRScanCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that should be implemented to receive discovered BluetoothDevices, notifications that a discovery process has completed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VRScanCallback() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void onDeviceFound(BluetoothDeviceBundle bluetoothDeviceBundle, ConnectionType connectionType)
      This function is called when a BluetoothDevices is discovered.
      abstract void onScanComplete(ConnectionType connectionType)
      This function is called once the scanning process completes.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • VRScanCallback

        public VRScanCallback()

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceFound

        public abstract void onDeviceFound(BluetoothDeviceBundle bluetoothDeviceBundle,
                 ConnectionType connectionType)
        This function is called when a BluetoothDevices is discovered. Only V1Connection BluetoothDevices are returned.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothDeviceBundle - A bundle consisting of a discovered BluetoothDevice, rssi and a human friendly name for the device.
        connectionType - The connectionType of the scanning process.

      • onScanComplete

        public abstract void onScanComplete(ConnectionType connectionType)
        This function is called once the scanning process completes.
        Parameters:
        connectionType - The connectionType of the scanning process.
